title: Video: Billy Fox – Avalanche
body:
Absolutely love this video from Sydney’s **Billy Fox** for recent single _Avalanche_.

There’s an almost Glass Animals meets King Krule vibe to the track, in that it manages to come across as emotionally raw yet with a cleaner, more accessible production edge to it, whilst the animated video is beautifully pieced together; an absolute must watch. Check it out below.

There’s an almost Glass Animals meets King Krule vibe to the track, in that it manages to come across as emotionally raw yet with a cleaner, more accessible production edge to it, whilst the animated video is beautifully pieced together; an absolute must \[…\]
